tool_description: Finazon's Forex API provides precise aggregated Forex data sourced from top contributors, prime banks, and financial institutions. Each feed is a meticulously calculated average of bid and ask prices from multiple over-the-counter (OTC) FX sources, selected for quality. This ensures accurate, reliable, and up-to-date data for market analysis, trading strategies, and financial app development.
name: Finazon Forex
title: Finazon Forex

api_list.name: /forex/time_series
api_list.description: This endpoint returns time series data for any given pair at a given interval.

required_parameters.name: interval
required_parameters.description: Interval between two consecutive points in time series

optional_parameters.name: start_at
optional_parameters.description: Filter output by start time using a UNIX timestamp

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Specific page of a paginated result to be displayed

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Sorting order of the output series

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Timezone of the output datetime, presented in tz database format

optional_parameters.name: end_at
optional_parameters.description: Filter output by end time using a UNIX timestamp

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the exact date to get the data for

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: Number of items displayed per page in a paginated result

items.description: QuoteItem represents a bar quote at the trading interval

c.description: Closing price at the end of the trading interval

h.description: Highest price reached during the trading interval

l.description: Lowest price reached during the trading interval

o.description: Price at the opening of the trading interval

t.description: Timestamp indicating when the trading interval opened

v.description: Trading volume recorded during the trading interval

api_list.name: /tickers/forex
api_list.description: Returns a list of 50+ available forex pairs. This list is updated daily.

optional_parameters.name: page_size
optional_parameters.description: Number of items displayed per page in a paginated result

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Specific page of a paginated result to be displayed
